SELECT pc.category_id, pc.name, pc.slug, pc.description, pc.icon_url, pc.display_order, pc.created_at, COUNT(pb.breed_id) as breed_count FROM pet_categories pc LEFT JOIN pet_breeds pb ON pc.category_id = pb.category_id GROUP BY pc.category_id, pc.name, pc.slug, pc.description, pc.icon_url, pc.display_order, pc.created_at ORDER BY pc.display_order ASC, pc.category_id ASC
